title: Rabbadon's deathcap is broken during this current patch
body: At the current time of this discussion, it is patch 5.5, I have noticed recently that the unique passive for Death cap's is currently not giving any bonus ap like it should. Funnily enough, no one has noticed even when I have said something. most of the reaction is "What? Really?" Kinda shows our dependance on that item and not noticing any changes. I first noticed it when playing Cassiopeia however at the time, i thought her passive and death cap's didn't stack and then i began to play more mages and saw the same problem. My question is. Is it broken? and if so has anyone noticed, it's broken?

replies.body:
Kids, do le math in-game.

There is nothing wrong.

Just for anyone reading this, S@20 had something about this in their red post collection. They said it is still giving ap and the bonus ap, it just does not reflect it in the tooltip. So worry not, still buy deathcap

I haven't noticed anything, I rarely get to play anymore let alone with a deathcap.

Some courses of action may to try the reddit mega thread for bugs they do every patch to see if it's been noticed.
I would also refer to it as bugged, because broken gives connoction of overpowered and makes it seem like a QQ thread from the title.
is it actually not giving ap, or is it just when you hover over it it says it's not giving any bonus ap.
